transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir Nadeem ji Imran baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan haan batao.
Executive: Haan sir wo maine yahan pe na escalate kiya tha apne bylead team ko to unka update aaya tha sir kal hi aa gaya tha ki unhone buyer se to baat kiya sir buyer ka clearly kehna hai ki unhone Rajasthan ke kisi party se unhone purchase kar liya reasonable price pe aur isiliye wo multiple call nahi chahte isliye unhone mana kar de raha hai ki matlab requirement nahi hai sir.
Customer: Buyer ne se clearly yahi cheez bola sir.
Executive: Meri saab baat hui hai unhone saab mere ko yahi cheez boli ke nahi mere ko koi requirement hi nahi hai ye pata nahi kyun reflect kar diya mera naam.
Executive: Saab meri baat hui hai unse aap hai na apna bana rahe ho to main jo sunaun wo to main aapko yahi bolunga na usne mera ye nahi bola maine buy kar liya.
Customer: Mere ko usne kya bola ke mere ko need hi nahi hai maine ka recommend bhi nahi kara kaise ho gaya aur uske pehle DK International ke lead pada hai mera usse utha ke dekh lo wo koi company ka hi hai aapke aise hi marketing wale hi hai usko kaise need hogi uska na recommend aaya tha catalog ke ye dekha hai to wo mera kaise catalog dekh liya uska bhi maine na wo by default hi kara tha.
Executive: Nahi sir maine escalate kiya tha agar aap over the video meeting aayega na sir kyunki internal mail main share nahi kar sakta sir. Main definitely aapko show kar sakta hun.
Customer: Main kya bol raha hun jo mere paas jo answer hai na main to wohi dunga na ab aap log kya kar rahe ho internally operation mein kya kar rahe ho mujhe usko leke koi matlab nahi hai aap logon se.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Maine jo meri taraf se tha maine escalation kar diya aap logon ko.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Us par karo jo bhi kuch hai uske baad hi mujhe call karo aur itne call kar rahe ho ke kya matlab hai kyunki aapke paas proper answer hi nahi hai to koi matlab ka nahi hai mere liye.
Executive: Sir proper answer ka baat nahi hai sir koi bhi bylead sir hamari bylead approval team sir approve karti hai theek hai sir ab maine wahan pe sir ye cheez ko escalate kiya gaya sir.
Customer: Mere ko wo baar baar ek hi cheez repeat mat karo wo baar baar ek hi cheez repeat mat karo main itne time tak aapse baat nahi kar paunga aap maine aapko raise kyun kara tha complaint kyunki aap logon ne galti kari hai to galti kari uska solution hai to hi mere se hai na aap baat karo baki main aapse baat nahi karunga.
Executive: Solution sir buyer se baat karne ke baad jo buyer ne hame update kiya sir uske according main aapko bata raha hun sir abhi aap kya chahte hain ye bataiye sir.
Customer: Ek kaam karo main meri taraf se record dal deta hun aap apni taraf se record dal do fir aap hai na jhoot jo bol rahe ho.
Executive: Matlab ye record matlab sir?
Customer: Voice record uska mere ko mention kar do aur main hai na mera meri side se jo hua main voice record main aapko update kar deta hun.
Executive: Sir voice record to nahi aaya agar aap video meeting mein aayega to jo update aaya hai na sir wo main aapko dikha dunga over the meeting.
Customer: Main koi mere ko koi interested nahi hai main main koi interested nahi hun video meeting mein aane ke liye.
Executive: To abhi aap kya chahte hain mujhe bataiye clearly sir.
Customer: Jo jo mere ko faltu mein consume hours ko revert karo aur hai na proper.
Executive: Sir wo revert ka to policy nahi hota hai sir revert ka to policy nahi hota.
Customer: Kaam hi nahi kar pa rahe fir kya aise hi leade utha ke de rahe ho kya aap log mujhe.
Executive: Sir lead sir hamara matchmaking platform hai buyer ka detail aapko dete hain sir aap kya baat karte ho sir usme to hum interfere nahi karte na sir.
Customer: Genuine hi nahi hai isko genuine hi nahi hai to kahan ki lead de rahe ho genuine hogi to mano consider karo baki consider nahi karo.
Executive: Genuine matlab sir genuine matlab sir matlab.
Customer: Genuine to samajhne ki koshish nahi kar pehle meri baat suno fir uske baad bolo main kya keh raha hun maine itni leads abhi hai na consume kari kabhi kisi ko leke related mein kuch kara kya complaint raise.
Customer: Jahan mere ko laga to main obvious karunga.
Executive: Hmm hmm bilkul sir achi baat hai aap.
Customer: To fir aap log understand kyun nahi kar rahe ho jo cheez bolna chah raha hun wo baar baar main cheeze nahi bol paunga aapko samjha chuka ek DK International ka bhi maine consume kara hua hai wo to hai na kisi company ka ek competitive aapki hai na koi company ka hi hai uska mere catalog pe aa gaya ke ye hai na aapka catalog dekh raha hai isko need hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Haan to main usse jab consume kara lead wo to saaf keh raha hai main to khud hi competitive ka hun.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur ye hai na filter ye IndiaMART wale to filter karke dete nahi lead jaise hi koi search karte seedha reflection pe dal dete hain filtering in the sense usko lead honi chahiye lead hi nahi hai aap log pehle se hai na publish kar dete ho hamare yahan page pe to hum log kya karenge ha bhai leads hai reflection pe aaiye hum log consume kar lete hain consume karke pata chalta hai to ye koi lead hi nahi hai jiska koi relevant mein kam koi hai hi nahi isko lead hi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To fir abhi kitna samjhaun yaar main nahi samjha paunga itna bachchon ki tarah bachchon ki tarah main treat nahi kar paunga ABCD ki tarah.
Executive: Sir maine maine main ek cheez bolun sir aapne aapne ek bylead ka hume feedback diya sir theek hai aur us same feedback ko maine apne sir bylead approval team ko maine escalate kiya tha.
Customer: To fir jhoot jhoot kyun bol rahe to jhoot kaise aa gaya to main jhoot thodi bolta tha mujhe maza aa raha hai kya tum logon se baat karne ke.
Executive: Sir main kahan bol raha hun sir ki aap jhoot bol rahe ho sir.
Customer: To fir aapne mujhe bola ki jo bhi update aata hai wo mujhe aap bata dena uske according main aapko bata raha hun sir ki ye mere paas kal update aa gaya tha sir.
Executive: Meri taraf se main bata chuka meri taraf se bata chuka yahi hai.
Customer: Usne saaf bola hai mujhe.
Executive: Usne saaf bola hai koi requirement nahi hai mujhe main to pata nahi kyun reflect kar gayi mere lead.
Customer: Abhi aap chahte ho ki aapka jo bylead hai wo reverse aapko karna hai na.
Executive: Haan reverse reverse reverse karo.
Executive: Chaliye sir wo cheez to possible nahi hai fir bhi main ek baar apne manager se bol deta hun sir.
Customer: Karo karo bol jahan pe bhi bolna hai bolo ya to aap log kaam nahi kar rahe fir theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for a buylead.

- Expresses frustration with irrelevant leads.

- Claims DK International is a competitor.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the buylead approval process.

- Executive offered to show update in video meeting.

- Executive will speak to manager about refund.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will speak to manager about refund.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, escalation, leads
